headline: ROSEN, A LEADING NATIONAL FIRM, Encourages Hasbro, Inc. Investors to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action - HAS
summary: WHY: Rosen Law Firm, a global investor rights law firm, announces the filing of a class action lawsuit on behalf of purchasers of common stock of Hasbro, Inc. between February 7, 2022 and October 25,...
